title: #027 - How I Booked 2 Coaching Clients This Week & Created Momentum In My Launch
itunes:title: #027 - How I Booked 2 Coaching Clients This Week & Created Momentum In My Launch
description:
5 Things You'll Learn In This Episode: 
- My process for booking coaching clients
- Why you shouldn’t feel deflated if an ideal client doesn’t book you
- The one thing to keep at the front of your mind when launching
- How this is Alex’s most prepared-for launch
- What Alex has let slip since being in launch mode
 
Alex gears up for a big win!
 
In this episode you’ll hear Alex bring you behind-the-scenes of one of the most important months of her year. As she gears up for the second launch of Gram Slam, she runs you through how she booked two coaching clients this week, and what she’s been doing to build momentum for her upcoming launch of Gram Slam! If you ever wonder what’s *really* going on for an online marketer right before a major launch, this is the episode for you!
 
This is On Purpose.
